np1: API error, After sometime has passed you can try again and it should be working
db2: Database error, If it is related to the server menu please rerun the command and it will work
perm3: Permission error, The bot does not have the required permissions to do a certain action
perm4: Permission error, The user does not have the required perimissions to run a certain command
ban5: User has been banned from using the bot
toggle6: Command has been disabled from the server
